title: Okutsu sequences in Henselian fields
abstract:
For $(K,v)$ a Henselian valued field, let $\theta\in\overline{K}$ with
minimal polynomial $F$ over $K$. Okutsu sequences of $\theta$ have been defined
only when the extension $K(\theta)/K$ is defectless. In this paper, we extend
this concept to arbitrary $\theta\in\overline{K}$ and we show that these
objects are essentially equivalent to Okutsu frames of $F$ and to Mac
Lane-Vaqui\'e chains of the natural valuation on $K[x]$ induced by $\theta$.
